attributes.action: Consider petitions that are not listed on petition.parliament for debate
attributes.additional_details: The government must debate all petitions that gain enough signatures not just those that are listed on the petition.parliament.uk website. Only debating petitions from the petition.parliament website reduces the amount of petitions available and hampers activism for social change.
attributes.background: Petitions that are listed on other websites must be considered for debate in Parliament. The government must respond to all petitions that gain 10,000 and consider petitions that gain 100,000 signatures for debate in Parliament.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325480
